articles.title: Benelli TRK 502 & TRK 502X get new colour options for MY2023. Check out - HT Auto
articles.description: The 2023 Benelli TRK 502 is now available in Grey, White and the new Black and Forest Green colour options. Meanwhile, the 2023 Benelli TRK 502X gets four colours including Grey, White, Yellow and the new Forest Green shade.
articles.content: The update also comes with a price hike of 25,000 on the MY2023 models. The Benelli TRK 502 is now priced at 5.85 lakh, while the TRK 502X is priced at 6.35 lakh. All prices are ex-showroom, India. T… [+1295 chars]
